customerImageUsages.description: Specifies the usage and identification of customer supplied images to be used on this document.

providedImageType.description: Specify the provided document image type.

items.description: Specify the usse and identification of supplied images to be used on this document.

provideInstructions.description: Indicates whether or not to provide the instructions.

options.description: Indicates the format options. SUPPRESS_ADDITIONAL_LANGUAGES value will suppress English language if another language is specified in the language code field.

optionsRequested.description: Indicate the requested options for document format.

stockType.description: Indicate the used label stock type. Note to list the correct type of paper for the freight address label option.

dispositions.description: Specifies how to create, organize, and return the document

eMailRecipients.description: Indicates the shipping document email recipients.

emailAddress.description:
Specifies the email address.
Example: email@fedex.com

recipientType.description: Specify the email notification recipient type.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
Example: 'en_US'
click here to see locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

grouping.description: Identifies the convention by which documents are to be grouped as email attachment.

eMailDetail.description: Specifies how to e-mail shipping documents.

dispositionType.description: Specify how to create and return the document.

items.description: These are document diposition details. Each occurrence of this class specifies a particular way in which a kind of shipping document is to be produced and provided.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
example: 'en_US'
click here to see Locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

docType.description:
Specify the image format used for a shipping document.
click here to see label format types

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: 10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302.

Note:

  • At least one line is required.
  • Streetlines more than 3 will be ignored.
  • Empty lines should not be included
  • For SmartPost Shipments, only 30 characters from the individual street lines will be printed on the labels.

city.description:
This is a placeholder for City Name.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for State or Province code.
Example: CA.
click here to see State or Province Code

postalCode.description:
This is the Postal code.
This is Optional for non postal-aware countries.
Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247
click here to see Postal aware countries

countryCode.description:
This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

geographicCoordinates.description:
Indicates the geographic coordinates.
example: geographicCoordinates

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the US).

personName.description:
Specify contact name. Maximum length is 70.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension. Maximum length is 6.
Example: 1234

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports Maximum as 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name.
Recommended length is 35.
Note: There's no specific validation of the company name.

faxNumber.description: Specify contact person's fax number. Maximum length is 15.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details for this shipment.

tins.description: This is the tax identification number details.

number.description:
Specify tax ID number. Maximum length is 18.
Example: 123567

tinType.description: Indicate the type of tax identification number.

usage.description: Specify the reason for using the tax identification number in shipment processing.

effectiveDate.description:
Specify the tax ID effective date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

expirationDate.description:
Specify the tax ID expiration date.
Example: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00

blanketPeriod.description: Date Range for custom delivery request; only used if type is BETWEEN.

certifierJobTitle.description: Specify the job title of the certifier

description: The instructions indicating how to print the USMCA Certificate of Origin (e.g. whether or not to include the instructions, image type, etc ...).
